description: List profit improvement subscriptions with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admin users can list all profit improvement subscriptions. Non-admin users can list subscriptions only for profit improvements they are authorized to view via the ProfitImprovement policy scope.
validation_notes: contact-method must be one of email_address or mobile_number. user and profit-improvement filters accept comma-separated IDs.

flags.name: user
flags.description: Filter by user ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: profit-improvement
flags.description: Filter by profit improvement ID (comma-separated for multiple)
flags.validation: Comma-separated list of profit improvement IDs.
